mapper.insert: insert into member (mId, mPassword, mLevel, mName, mClass, mGender, mNation, mNativePlace, mAdmissionTime, mIdCard, mPhone, mPlace, mFamilyPlace) values (#{mId}, #{mPassword}, #{mLevel}, #{mName}, #{mClass}, #{mGender}, #{mNation}, #{mNativePlace}, #{mAdmissionTime}, #{mIdCard}, #{mPhone}, #{mPlace}, #{mFamilyPlace})
mapper.select: select * from member where mId = #{mId} and mPassword = #{mPassword}
